description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Sesame Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sticky Sesame Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slash each drumstick a couple of times where the meat is thickest. Place in a large snap-lock bag.
Combine sauces, sugar, garlic and ginger in a jug. Pour into the bag and seal tight.
Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes, or overnight if you have time, turning occasionally.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C and line a roasting pan with bake paper or foil.

Transfer drumsticks and marinade to pan, arranging in a single layer. Bake for 20 minutes. Turn and baste with marinade and sprinkle evenly with sesame seeds. Return to oven and cook for a further 20-25 minutes, until cooked through.
While drumsticks are cooking, deep-fry wedges until golden.
Serve drumsticks with wedges and salad.
